item.description:
We'll meet in the parking lot at 11 am.

Ines Smrz has been kind enough to sponsor a cookout at her home after the walk. It's going to be a pot luck event. Please bring something to sit on, a dish to share and something to grill. Also bring whatever you want to drink.
item.how_to_find_us: WE;LL MEET IN THE PARKING LOT

group.name: The Chestnut Hill Walking Meetup Group

item.name: BORDERLAND STATE PARK - CHESTNUT HILL MEETUP
